mapper.sql: orderno, user_id, apply_amount, real_lyb, status, platform_type, apply_time, handle_time, platform_order, handle_type, source, remark, operatorid, payment_orderno, notify_status, platform_source, change_type, plateform_id, son_plateformid, service_id, currency, gold, country
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) as userCount, SUM(apply_amount) as amountSum, COUNT(orderno) as orderCount FROM tbl_recharge_record WHERE status != 0 AND pay_time <= #{endTime} AND pay_time >= #{startTime} GROUP BY source

SELECT a.source as source, COUNT(DISTINCT(a.user_id)) as userCount FROM tbl_recharge_record a INNER JOIN tbl_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.create_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.create_time) > 0 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(a.apply_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(a.apply_time) > 0 GROUP BY a.source;

SELECT a.source as source, COUNT(DISTINCT(a.user_id)) as userCount FROM tbl_recharge_record a INNER JOIN tbl_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(b.create_time) > 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(apply_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(apply_time) > 0 GROUP BY a.source

select count(DISTINCT (orderno)) as count from tbl_recharge_record where status != 0
and apply_time>= date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), interval #{intervalTime} minute)
and apply_time<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

SELECT plateform_id AS platformId, source AS sourceType, user_id AS userId, COUNT(orderno) AS orderCount, SUM(apply_amount) AS applyAmountSum FROM tbl_recharge_record WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(apply_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(apply_time) > 0 GROUP BY plateform_id,source,user_id

select source as osType,count(DISTINCT(user_id)) as rechargePopulation ,sum(apply_amount) as rechargeAmount,count(orderno) as rechargeCount from tbl_recharge_record where status != 0
and pay_time>= date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), interval #{intervalTime} minute)
and pay_time<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by source
